reviewText: I wish they were released as they were aired on HBO, it would be really great and I know they'd sell a blank-load of them. I read that the first disc set is now out of print so it would be an opportune time to get these together with a bunch of extras and put them on blu-ray and I can promise people will buy them up. A lot of people love these shows!!!

reviewText: Not as great as THE TWILIGHT ZONE,but each week a different kind of story line.I would like to see more like that.Thankyou
Title: N/A

reviewText: For anyone who likes anthology series, this is perfect. It is like the Twilight Zone, with Page Fletcher giving monologues on each episode, and the episodes giving a creepy atmosphere, often with a moral theme at the end. Every episode on this collection, as well as the guest cast, is first rate. I'm glad I got into this series!

reviewText: This entire series would more than hold it's own in today's tv market. The stories are engrossing and most likely have you peeking under your bed before getting into it.
